snippet: Ryan O’Reilly scored a power-play goal 28 seconds into overtime, and the Colorado Avalanche rallied for a 2-1 victory over the host Devils.
abstract: Colorado Avalanche defeat New Jersey Devils, 2-1, in overtime; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan O’Reilly scored a power-play goal 28 seconds into overtime, and the Colorado Avalanche rallied for a 2-1 victory over the host Devils.

headline.main: Devils Lose to Avalanche in Overtime
headline.print_headline: Devils Lose to Avalanche in Overtime
